# Here is a social class table that is fairly accurate to medieval Europe and simple.

# Color function does not work yet need to be able to use multiple parameters

:Start
1, You are from the [SC1] class. {Status~by Scott Stokes}

:SC1
01-03,slave or indentured servant
04-59,servant or farmer
60-70,working
71-80,tradesman
81-94,craftsman
95-98,Guild Leader / Mayor
99-100,{Color~Blue,[SC2]}

:SC2
01-40,Knight / Dame
41-60,Baron
61-80,Viscount or Governor
81-94,Count or Earl
95-99,Marquis or Marquees
100,{Color~Purple,[SC3]}

:SC3
1-90,Sovereign Prince, Duke or Imperial Prince
91-98,Grand or Arch Duke, or Sovereign Crown Prince
99,Imperial Crown Prince, Sovereign King
100,Emperor or Empress
